name: design-system-ai
description: Design System AI - Figma Plugin for analyzing design tokens and components

scripts.build: tsc code.ts --outDir . --target es2018 --lib es2018,dom --module esnext --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck
scripts.watch: tsc code.ts --outDir . --target es2018 --lib es2018,dom --module esnext --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck --watch
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo 'Build complete. Reload plugin in Figma.'
